title: (Thurs Early Bird) Amy vs. Lunchbox Trivia Questions + Elevator Country Karaoke With Stranger In Vegas + Mailbag: Listener's Husband Is Spending Too Much On Lottery Tickets
itunes:title: (Thurs Early Bird) Amy vs. Lunchbox Trivia Questions + Elevator Country Karaoke With Stranger In Vegas + Mailbag: Listener's Husband Is Spending Too Much On Lottery Tickets
description:
We start the morning by bringing Amy vs. Lunchbox back! They have to answer trivia questions and whoever loses has to eat ice cream with A1 sauce on it. Plus, hear how it went down when Lunchbox did some elevator country karaoke with strangers in Las Vegas! Mailbag: A listener's husband is spending too much money playing the lottery. He keeps losing but doesn't see a problem with it. We give advice on what to do to get him to stop or at least pull back.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
